polls.question: Web Development Skills Poll
polls.answers: I use the internet for mainly socializing & entertainment.--|--I use the internet for mainly news, research, & education.--|--I know some programming languages, but none that can be used for Zeronet site development.--|--I know at least HTML and understand how Zeronet sites work.--|--I know HTML & CSS--|--I know HTML, CSS, Javascript, and I am good at it.--|--I helped build Zeronet on Github--|--Here... Code is law, and I'm busy writing the entire Rule book.

comments.body: Simply click on the Poll Question to access the comments... simple...
Hide voted on polls is now broken for me. Does nothing
I don't know what's up, I reloaded the page and it works again.

I would like an option to block all port to the clearnet on new pages & only allow it on 'trusted' pages.
I've seen people place tracking images on 0sites in an attempt to monitor the page visits., and unless you load the page via a zeroProxy, you don't know what you're loading until it's loaded.

Sure you can set your browser to use a proxy, and other manual ways, but should be an easy tick option on the sidepanel.

It is a good idea but it would need to be specified when posting the poll.
Default selection of 1 item, but poller can specific however many 2,3, 4, infinite.

While it's a great idea, we wouldn't want people voting both on a Yes / No poll or similar.

But with facebook or twitter, if something you don't like is thrown in your face, you can unfollow their channel. It's not forced on the user.
But there are different forms of censorship. If you have a blog / wall and someone is harassing you or spamming your wall, you're allowed to block them, and rightfully so. It's you're space, others should respect that, but the spammer would claim censorship.

There is a balance between censorship & respecting one's space.

Oh, well if it's meant that way, on a global level, all censorship is bad.  Too bad I can't change my vote to the first one but oh well, poll wasn't specific enough.  It just said censorship of speech. Those trolls have a voice too, regardless of how small it may be.

If we are considering all forms of censorship, then yes, my choice is right, some level of censorship will be needed. Such as harassment prevention.

We have to understand that while the environment may allow for censorship free development, a 'popular / creditable' platform will establish some level of censorship to be deemed acceptable by it's users.

No one I know would proudly be a patron of a platform where CPorn is available. And while the Trolls, and spammers have every right to create their own blog/forum of Spammers-R-Us' in a censorship free environment. It will be the administrators and moderators choice on what is deemed acceptable or to host the forum as a complete censorship free area.

But for anything that wishes to be popular and acceptable by the masses, it will enforce some level of censorship on it's users. Take The Pirate Bay for example, while they don't remove any torrents due to DMCA, they won't allow CP or other things deemed inappropriate by society.

And i don't want my terminology to be confused, a platform would be ZeroTalk or ZeroBlog, while the environment is Zeronet.
If someone doesn't like warporn, don't visit warporn sites. But it's unfair to create an environment where warporn can't exist. That's bad and only opens a pandora's box.

Well even if we are strictly discussing speech, not content/media, just think of someone who has their own channel and wants to rid themselves of some spammer posting undesired comments on the wall. To the spammer / troll, this is censorship.

But the key point of that topic is to realize that a troll is only relevant to the eye of the beholder. And in a way, we (ZeroNet users and supporters) are trolls to the governments and media agencies who wish to censor our text, such as guides to bypass website censorship. Such guides are content / media free, and are only text.
Neither, I would throw my ballot into the garbage.

I feel users who spam should have their poll deleted and banned. If they don't like it, they are free to make their own Poll-Board of Spam where they can post censorship free spam polls to their hearts content.

Bittorrent Sync with a VPS  
https://www.getsync.com
Anything birthed from Google is evil. Look at NSA friendly gmail & SueSupporting YouTube.
I don't fear the AI, I fear what it will learn from humans and if we really are worth keeping around.

I'm one of the few who said 'No'. There is a place for copyright in this world, but only restricted to pure commercial use. Anything created for non-profit should be copyright exempt.

Copyright reform is possible, copyright abolishment is not.
<3 math, it's one of the few absolutes in this world.
